comment: Dr. Bob is an awesome professor! He does go into great detail because of how passionate he is about the material. He is always ready to answer questions and help in any way! He does give our study guides which is sort of rare in upper level classes AND they are helpful! I would say the same for his exercise physiology class!

I love Dr. Buresh! He's a really chill and funny guy. He really knows his stuff and is passionate. He gives a study guide a few days before the test that is really helpful. The material isn't easy but he prepares you properly for it. He gives an attendance code every class for a quiz so make sure you go! He has a sense of humor!
